description: This blueprint represents a project in LaunchDarkly.
title: LaunchDarkly Project

key.title: Project Key
key.description: The unique key identifier for the LaunchDarkly project.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the project for organizational purposes.

defaultClientSideAvailability.title: Default Client Side Availability
defaultClientSideAvailability.description: The default client-side availability for the project.

includeInSnippetByDefault.title: Include In snippet By Default
includeInSnippetByDefault.description: Indicates if project is included in client-side snippets by default.

description: This blueprint represents a feature flag in LaunchDarkly.
title: LaunchDarkly Feature Flag

kind.title: Flag Kind
kind.description: The type of the feature flag (e.g., boolean).

key.title: Flag Key
key.description: The unique key identifier for the feature flag.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of what the flag controls.

creationDate.title: Creation Date
creationDate.description: The date and time when the flag was created.

includeInSnippet.title: Include in Client-Side Snippet
includeInSnippet.description: Indicates if the flag is included in the client-side snippet.

clientSideAvailability.title: Client-Side Availability
clientSideAvailability.description: Availability of the flag for client-side applications.

temporary.title: Temporary Flag
temporary.description: Indicates if the flag is temporary.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags associated with the feature flag.

maintainer.title: Maintainer
maintainer.description: Information about the maintainer of the flag.

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: Settings and information for each environment the flag is used in.

customProperties.title: Custom Properties
customProperties.description: Custom properties associated with the flag.

archived.title: Archived
archived.description: Indicates if the flag is archived.

description: This blueprint represents an entry in the LaunchDarkly audit log
title: LaunchDarkly Audit Log

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: The unique identifier of the LaunchDarkly account associated with this event.

date.title: Event Date
date.description: The timestamp of when the event occurred.

name.title: Event Name
name.description: The name of the event or the entity affected by this event.

description.title: Description
description.description: a detailed description of the log

shortDescription.title: Short Description
shortDescription.description: a short description of the log

member.title: Member Details
member.description: Information about the LaunchDarkly user associated with this event.

title.title: Action Taken
title.description: A verb describing the action taken in this event

accesses.title: Access Details
accesses.description: Details about the specific actions taken during the event.

target.title: Target Resource
target.description: Details about the primary resource affected by this event.
